articles.content: 21:07 Local Time, 20:07 GMT, 01:37 IST: Dominating performance from Somerset. They reduced Glamorgan to 53/5 after opting to bowl. Carlson and van der Gugten forged a 91-run stand which ensured a res… [+509 chars]
